Hi all,

I am trying to simulate a piston using a moving wall in a batch re=
actor.

I use the following from a cantera tutorial,

omega=3D2*pi*(frequen=
cy)
coeffs =3D[(0.0 ,0.0), (0.0, (amplitude)]
piston_rate =3DFourier(omega,=
coeffs)
w=3DWall( env,r1,velocity=3Dpiston_rate)

I can get this to work.

=
But I cant find any documentation on the Fourier function in cantera. 
Does=
 anyone know any more?

The form of the function "velocity" is not clear. I=
t is refered to as 
a 'functor'? and I want to be able to understand how to=
 pass time based 
functions for heat transfer and velocity to the wall obje=
ct.

Thanks in advance for any info,
Adam.
